escalation_policy.Description: The escalation policy specifies who will be notified when an incident is created by this alert source

heartbeat.Description: A heartbeat alert source will automatically create an incident if it does not receive a heartbeat signal from your app at regular intervals.

interval_sec.Description: The interval after which the heartbeat alert source will create an incident if it does not receive a ping

summary.Description: This text will be used as the incident summary, when incidents are created by this alert source

name.Description: The name of the resource, also acts as it's unique ID
